fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Attack a player for 1 HP. Apply 2 phases of your choice of Bleeding, Burning, or Crippled if undefended.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Attack a player for 3 HP. Apply 2 phases of your choice of Bleeding, Burning, or Crippled regardless if the target defended. 

*Stackable. If a status is not chosen when played, a random status will be chosen. Status takes effect next phase. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses.*
